page.title: 12Leisure and Recreation
page.content: In New Mills there are many recreational facilities. There are several council owned football pitches, a swimming pool and squash courts, a youth centre, a cricket ground, a public park and play areas. In New Mills there is a junior football team and a senior football team who have their own pitch and in the winter the youth centre. The New Mills senior team is the Millers. The swimming pool in New Mills is used by the public as well as the schools and other organisations. Every third Saturday they have an inflatable monster to play on. There are squash courts at the swimming pool and on Hibbert Street near the Marina. There are 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th,5th and 6th divisions.
